KitsPage.headerSubtitle: Discover all the designs so you can have fun embroidering.
KitsPage.description: These kits are ideal for experienced embroiderers, so if this is your first time embroidering, we recommend purchasing one of our online courses on basic embroidery or attending one of our workshops.
KitsPage.carouselDescription: These are some of the kits that you can find in our catalog
